column5: So these are the fall days i remember and i am lucky enough to have tomorrow off.  Was wondering if anyone else was heading out for some steel in the morning..... Would be cool to see some of u guys or gals out there
If I had the day off I'd be on the tribs at first light!  Go get 'em and post a report when you get back!  Good luck!
will do.... hope the fish come out to play lol
Im heading out, rivers are up but so are the winds...luck to the other brave souls
1 more sleep and im off till sunday night so u know where i will be
I am going Wednesday morning before class hopefully I pick a couple up! Hopes for snow tonight instead of rain so that the water isn't chocolate milk in the morning
